name: Darts Loop
description:
Darts Loop is an arcade version of the famous offline Darts game. But unlike classic Darts, the player's task is to hit the rotating target!

The game is available in English, Russian and Turkish.

How to play

5 darts are given for the round. You must score a certain number of points in 5 shots to win the round. Points are earned by accurately hitting the target. The strength of the throw changes cyclically.

The target is divided by 12 sections. Each section corresponds to a different number of points. A player gets +1 score when hits the edge, +25 score when hits the center and -1 score when missed the target.

Control

Single tap on the dart to play on mobile devices. Single mouse click on the dart or ENTER/SPACE key press on the keyboard to play on PC.
